name: Mobile Attack
overview: Mobile Attack is a clone/variant of the arcade game Targ for the Commodore VIC-20. Shoot the enemies in the maze before they run you over and kill you. Avoid crashing your attack ship with aliens in a labyrinth. Blow out all aliens and move on to the next challenge. The game was published by MSD aka Micro Systems in 1982. The game is also somewhat similar to a game released the year prior year called Titan.
